TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FORMATETC extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 一个通用的剪贴板格式，它包含目标设备、数据外观或视图以及存储介质指示符。

span.span: A generalized Clipboard format containing a target device, the aspect or view of the data, and a storage medium indicator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks FORMATETC 结构用作 OLE 函数和需要数据的格式信息的方法中的参数。The FORMATETC structure is used as a parameter in OLE functions and methods requiring data format information. 有关编程的详细信息结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
